titles: A letter from Sr. Balthazar Gerbier Knight. To his three daughters inclosed. In a nunnery att Paris.
author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.
notes: Dated at end: Paris the 4. of May 1646.
Wing says printed in London, but obviously printed abroad and probably at Paris, where Gerbier had been living (see DNB).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
